Key Match Events: Juan Soto hit a three-run homer in the top of the 10th inning to give the Yankees a 5-2 victory over the Guardians.
Giancarlo Stanton hit a two-run homer in the sixth inning to tie the game at 2-2.
Post-Match Reflections: Hal Steinbrenner, the general partner of the Yankees, expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees acquired Juan Soto last winter to return them to the World Series.
Others: Emmanuel Clase, the closer for the Guardians, had a shaky performance in the previous two games but redeemed himself in Game 5.
